seo.title: Minutes.AI now supports Online Meetings (iOS)
seo.description: Click "Online" to issue a URL, share it, and start a Zoom-like meeting instantly. Clean minutes are generated automatically when the meeting ends.
seo.ogDescription: Start Zoom-like meetings from the "Online" button and get automatic, well-formatted minutes at the end.

ld.headline: Minutes.AI adds Online Meetings
ld.description: Host Zoom-like meetings via an issued URL, then get automatic minutes with clear decisions and actions.

hero.tagline:
Go from "Start Meeting" to "Finished Minutes"—Instantly.
Click the new **"Online"** button, issue a unique URL, and share it with your team. Just like that, you’re in a live meeting. When you hang up, Minutes.AI automatically gets to work generating your complete, formatted minutes.

release.p1: Forget switching between apps. We’ve built a powerful, Zoom-like online meeting feature directly into Minutes.AI for iOS.
release.p2: This update transforms your workflow: you no longer need one app to host the call and another to analyze it. It’s an all-in-one solution.
release.p3: Host your call with a clean, familiar interface. The moment your meeting ends, Minutes.AI automatically generates your high-quality minutes, complete with clearly captured **decisions and action items**.

image.caption: Start a Zoom-like meeting right from the "Online" button.

steps.h2: How to Start in 4 Simple Steps
items: **Tap "Online"**: Find the new "Online" button in the app or on the web.
**Issue URL**: Instantly get a unique, shareable meeting link.
**Share & Meet**: Send the link to your participants to join the call.
**Get Minutes**: End the meeting, and your automated minutes will be ready moments later.
**Familiar, High-Quality UX**: Enjoy a smooth, Zoom-like video call experience (powered by LiveKit).
**One-Click Simplicity**: No setup required. Just tap once to get your meeting link.
**Fully Automatic Minutes**: The core strength of Minutes.AI, now built directly into your calls.
**Clean, Readable Formats**: Get minutes that highlight decisions and actions, not just a wall of text.
**Multilingual Support**: Perfect for global teams, with support for multiple languages.
**Meeting Duration:** The total available meeting time is based on your current Minutes.AI plan and remaining quota.
**Call Quality:** As with any online call, audio and video quality may be affected by your network conditions and device settings.

pricing.h2: How This Works With Your Minutes.AI Plan
pricing.p1: Since "pricing" is a top question, here’s a simple breakdown of how this new feature works with our plans.
pricing.p2: Your meeting time quota is the same as your transcription quota. We offer two simple options that fit how you work.

timepacks.p1: Perfect for occasional meetings. Buy a pack of minutes, and use them whenever you want—this month, or next year.

subs.p1: For teams with regular or daily meetings. Forget watching the clock—just go truly unlimited.

free.quote: **Don't forget:** You get a **3-minute free ticket every single day** to try any feature, including Online Meetings!
